title: New: Sunboy – A.B.C.D.N.A.
body:
New **Sunboy** is always great.

This track comes courtesy of [Don’t Need No Melody’s](http://dontneednomelody.com/) 80N7 label compilation (if you aren’t already on their blog, check it out; always posting killer, unheard music), and is another glorious sprawling psych-rock indebted outing. With their lead vocals getting more and more confident with every release, they’re rapidly becoming one of the most exciting new bands around right now. Check out _A.B.C.D.N.A._ below.
